description: Tina is an open-source site editing toolkitasdfasdf for React-based sites like Gatsby & Next.js

three_points.supporting: Manage content on your own site, not another platform. Import Tina directly into your components to expose an editing interface for controlling and updating layers of your content mesh. You define the content model and editing powers specific to your site.
Itâ€™s pretty much my favorite animal. Itâ€™s like a lion and a tiger mixedâ€¦ bred for its skills in magic.asdfasdfasdf

This is not one-size-fits-all CMS. Tina is a grassroots open source javascript toolkit with a plugin-rich ecosystem. You can customize and extend the toolkit to suit your needs. Get and give help with a robust community of contributors.

setup.headline: Make your site editable in five minutes.

steps.step: Wrap and export your templates with Tina components specific to your data
